Name: market for lorry, 16 metric ton | lorry, 16 metric ton | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/29:Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers/291:Manufacture of motor vehicles/2910:Manufacture of motor vehicles
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23900/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'lorry, 16 metric ton', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This product is a mobile infrastructure that is used in the service of transportation. This lorry represents the infrastructure used to transport goods with a kilometric performance of 540,000 km. It falls under the class of 16 metric tons, meaning that it has a maximum gross vehicle weight of 16 metric tons.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'lorry, 16 metric ton',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'lorry, 16 metric ton',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
